title: Anne of Green Gables
description: A new edition of L. M. Montgomery's Anne of Green Gables in honor of the hundredth-year anniversary of the enduring classic.In addition to publishing Before Green Gables, we are issuing a special collectible edition of Anne of Green Gables, which will be a facsimile of the 1908 version and will feature the original cover art.  Old and new fans alike will revel in this elegant keepsake of the timeless classic.
author: L.M. Montgomery
